item.description: North Shore Folk Festival and Boston Millionaires meet up at the Historic Old Town Hall 32 Derby SQ. Salem, Ma. 01970. Folk singer entertainers from the New England area will be performing throughout the entire day rain or shine. This is the 3 rd year for this show and it will be a fabulous days outing for the whole family. We look forward to the Spring Show for lots of fun and adventure. For Ticket sales and more information contact John Kane at 617-549-0365
item.name: 5-7-11 North Shore Folk Festival meet up with Boston Millionaires in Salem, Ma.
